definition.name: Docker Login
definition.description: GitHub Action to login against a Docker registry
definition.author: docker

inputs.name: registry
inputs.description: Server address of Docker registry. If not set then will default to Docker Hub

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Username used to log against the Docker registry

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: Password or personal access token used to log against the Docker registry

inputs.name: ecr
inputs.description: Specifies whether the given registry is ECR (auto, true or false)

inputs.name: logout
inputs.description: Log out from the Docker registry at the end of a job

inputs.name: registry-auth
inputs.description: Raw authentication to registries, defined as YAML objects
